CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Repeat Purchase stage positioned above or below the Retail Placement stage?
SRP.A: The Repeat Purchase stage is positioned {below} the Retail Placement stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Customer Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Customer Purchase is {489}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {706}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Launch in Market?
VE.A: The value of stage Launch in Market is {990}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Taste Testing, with a value of {1486}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Repeat Purchase, with a value of {431}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {58} Thousand Bottles from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion?
SC.A: Decreased by {70} Thousand Bottles from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {147} Thousand Bottles from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 671? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Taste Testing} stage has {1486}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {990}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {706}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 460? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 562 and 671? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to {Launch in Market} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Launch in Market} to {Retail Placement} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, or from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to stage {Launch in Market} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Taste Testing} and {Launch in Market} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Customer Purchase} and {Repeat Purchase} stages.
